statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage
SELECT customer_id, data_usage FROM CustomerDataUsage
SELECT data_usage, data_limit FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE data_limit > 100
SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT customer_id, data_usage, usage_timestamp FROM CustomerDataUsage ORDER BY usage_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE data_usage > 100 AND data_limit < 500 ORDER BY data_usage DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(data_usage) AS total_usage FROM CustomerDataUsage GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_usage > 1000
SELECT customer_id, data_usage, usage_timestamp FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE data_usage BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY usage_timestamp ASC
SELECT customer_id, data_limit FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE data_usage > data_limit ORDER BY data_limit ASC, data_usage DESC
SELECT AVG(data_usage) AS avg_usage, MAX(data_usage) AS max_usage, MIN(data_usage) AS min_usage FROM CustomerDataUsage
SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage;
SELECT customer_id, data_usage FROM CustomerDataUsage ORDER BY data_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(data_usage) AS max_usage, MIN(data_usage) AS min_usage FROM CustomerDataUsage;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage JOIN FairUsagePolicy ON CustomerDataUsage.data_usage > FairUsagePolicy.data_limit ORDER BY CustomerDataUsage.data_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE data_usage > 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, data_usage, usage_date FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT policy_name, data_limit FROM FairUsagePolicy WHERE data_limit >= 500;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage JOIN FairUsagePolicy ON CustomerDataUsage.data_usage < FairUsagePolicy.data_limit;
SELECT AVG(data_usage) AS avg_usage FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE usage_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage
SELECT customer_id, data_usage, date FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE data_usage > 100
SELECT customer_id, data_usage FROM CustomerDataUsage ORDER BY data_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM FairUsagePolicy WHERE data_limit >= 500
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name FROM RegulatoryCompliance WHERE compliant = TRUE
SELECT * FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT data_usage, date FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE data_usage > 100 ORDER BY data_usage ASC;
SELECT AVG(data_usage) FROM CustomerDataUsage WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryCompliance WHERE regulation_name LIKE 'GDPR%';
SELECT cdu.customer_id, cdu.data_usage, fup.policy_name FROM CustomerDataUsage cdu JOIN FairUsagePolicy fup ON cdu.data_usage < fup.data_limit;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, data_usage_mb FROM customers WHERE data_usage_mb > 1000;
SELECT * FROM data_usage_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC, data_usage_mb ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_type='Premium' AND data_usage_mb > 500 ORDER BY data_usage_mb DESC

SELECT c.name, d.log_date, d.data_usage_mb FROM customers c JOIN data_usage_logs d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY d.data_usage_mb DESC
SELECT * FROM fair_usage_policies WHERE max_data_usage_mb > 1000 ORDER BY subscription_type ASC
SELECT r.* FROM regulations r WHERE r.regulation_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY regulation_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, data_usage FROM customer_data WHERE data_usage > 500;
SELECT customer_name, data_usage, data_limit FROM customer_data ORDER BY data_limit DESC;
SELECT regulation_title, regulation_description FROM telecommunications_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, log_date FROM compliance_logs WHERE customer_id = 1234567890;
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, data_usage FROM customer_data WHERE data_usage > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, data_usage FROM customer_data WHERE data_usage <= 500 ORDER BY data_usage DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, d.data_usage, f.policy_description FROM customer_data c JOIN data_monitoring d ON c.id = d.customer_id JOIN fair_usage_policies f ON d.data_usage > f.max_data_limit;
SELECT c.customer_name, l.action_taken, l.log_date FROM customer_data c JOIN compliance_logs l ON c.id = l.customer_id ORDER BY l.log_date DESC;
